system.description: This ornate bracer fits over the stump of a missing hand. You can use a mental command at any time (no action required) to summon a spectral, skeletal hand from the end of the bracer, allowing the user to function as though they had a natural hand in its place. You may also dismiss the hand, if desired (no action required). Finally, the hand can function as per the mage hand spell for up to an hour per day. The hour need not be continuous. While the hand is used this way, you lose the use of the hand as a normal hand until it returns.
